About.paragraph: WiserMachines aims to accelerate your factory's digital transformation with its intuitive and flexible IoT platform. The solution helps to easily collect data from any piece of manufacturing equipment and converts it into powerful, actionable insights that minimizes machine downtime, maximizes your production, and promotes profitability.
Why: Real-time Monitoring of Temperature and Humidity to maintain the cold chain
Why2: Business Analytics i.e. Shift-wise Productivity, Production Status, etc.

Features.title: Monitor in Real-Time
Features.text: Track machine up-time for keeping up with the production schedules. Keep remote check of production and maintenance schedules in real time.

Features.title: Plug-and-Play
Features.text: Seemlessly integrate IoT nodes to your factory shopfloor.

Features.title: Leverage Data
Features.text: Meet and exceed production goals with real-time visibility of machine and job information.

Features.title: Analytics and OEE
Features.text: Analyze and optimize actual cycle times for performance, machine availability, and quality metrics.
